bengaliName: ট্রেসেমে কন্ডিশনার কেরাটিন স্মুথ (ভারত) ১৯০ মিলি
longDesc: Launched in 1947, TRESemmé was named after renowned hair care expert Edna Emmé. Up until the 1950's, TRESemmé was sold only in salons. Today it is available at a shop near you, so that you can have salon style hair at home. For over 60 years, TRESemmé has built a history of success in 13 countries around the world. From its origins in 1947 and salon expertise, TRESemme has been driven by a simple truth: every woman deserves to look & feel fabulous, like she has just stepped out of the salon, everyday. This range has been carefully selected for its advanced formula. Driven by our salon heritage, we work with our stylists to deliver exper solutions from salon quality products without the salon price tag. Our salon inspired products enriched with high quality ingredients help you experience that salon feeling, everyday. Specially formulated with lower sulfates, TRESemme Keratin Smooth Shampoo helps restore keratin and nourishes each strand to leave hair gorgeously straighter, shinier and more manageable. When used together with Keratin Smooth Conditioner, it controls frizz for up to 48 hours and transforms your hair to be gorgeously straighter, more manageable and easy to style. Apply to wet hair, gently massage and work into a lather. For best results use after shampooing with TRESemme Keratin Smooth Shampoo.Start Shopping Now!
name: Tresemmé Conditioner Keratin Smooth 190 ml

longDesc:
• Product type: Hair Serum
• Brand: Livon
• Quantity: 50 ml
• No more frizzy hair
• Makes hair silky & shiny hair, instantly!
• No more tangles!  
• Hair damage protection
• Reduces hair breakage
• Mild fragrance inspired by fine fragrances
• Tired of frizzy hair (উস্কখুস্ক চুল)? Having a bad hair day? Struggling to get that perfect finish for your hair? Livon silk n shine hair serum is your answer! It eases frizz and instantly gives your hair a silky shiny finish! It also helps in controlling flyaway hair, eases out tangles and makes your hair supers smooth. Now get perfect silky shiny hair in seconds! It is suited for all hair types, Livon Serum’s lightweight formula enriched with 'Aloe Vera & Vitamin E' makes your hair silky and shiny without getting sticky! 
• Use Livon in 3 easy steps: 
o Step 1: Use it on slightly damp hair, anytime and anywhere you need!
o Step 2: Pour 3 Drops of Livon
o Step 3: Apply from the middle to the ends of your hair
name: Livon Hair Serum (2.5ml X 4 pcs) 10 ml

longDesc:
"Veet Hair Removal Cream Normal Skin. 
Discover beautiful, touchably-smooth skin that stays moisturised for as long as upto 24 hours*, with Veet Hair Removal Cream. That too in only 3 minutes**. Veet works close to the root of the hair, giving you superior, long-lasting smoothness***. Our Normal Skin formula is enriched with Lotus Milk, known for its softening properties, and scented with Jasmine fragrance. So you’ll have not just smooth, but silky-soft, moisturised & nourished skin.

Available in 25g, 50g and 100g

* As validated using a skin test tool and consumer panel.

** The time the cream takes to work depends on the thickness of hair.

*** Than shaving.

Box Contents

1 hair removal cream tube
1 spatula
1 leaflet
Ingredients

Aqua, Urea, Potassium Thioglycolate, Paraffinum Liquidum, Cetearyl Alcohol, Calcium Hydroxide, Talc, Ceteareth-20, Glycerin, Sorbitol , Potassium Hydroxide, Magnesium Trisilicate, Parfum, Propylene Glycol , Lithium Magnesium Sodium Silicate, Sodium Gluconate, Acrylates Copolymer, Linalool, Hydrated Silica, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Xanthan Gum, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, CI 77891, CI 45380"

longDesc:
Nihar Naturals Anti Hairfall 5 Seeds Hair Oil is a hair fall control oil from the trusted house of Nihar and helps to reduce hair fall by up to 8 times
Nihar Naturals Anti Hairfall 5 Seeds Hair Oil has unique combination of real Active-seeds like Methi, Sarson, Kalonji, Lauki and Til which are known to reduce hair fall and promote hair growth
It comes with a Unique Anti Hairfall 5 Seeds Hair Oil Cap that soaks Active-seeds with coconut oil and increases the strength of oil
It helps to control your hair fall in 3 simple steps: Just Tilt, Soak and Pour out the Anti Hairfall 5 Seeds Hair Oil that your hair needs.
Now hair fall control is possible without extra effort!
Suitable for daily Use both Pre and post Wash
1. Tilt and squeeze the bottle to bring the oil to the cap
2. Soak to let the oil mix with the seeds
3. Pour and apply on hair as desired

bengaliName: ডাবর মেঠি আমলা চুলের তেল ২00 মিলি
longDesc:
Dabur Amla is a heritage brand, trusted by crores to give you longer, stronger, thicker and hence beautiful hair. Dabur Methi Amla hair oil has Amla and Methi extracts. Amla is known to be a power fruit for your hair. Dabur Amla hair oil penetrates well into your scalp, nourishes your scalp and hair with the power of amla. Dabur Amla helps make your hair strong from the roots, helps in hair growth to give longer hair and also makes them thick and shiny. 
• Stimulates hair growth: ideal if you are suffering with hair loss or simply want longer, healthier-looking hair, this organic oil for hair has been specifically designed increased hair growth
• All natural, unique ingredients: as the only oil for hair growth on the market containing Methi and curry leaves, this ayurvedic inspired hair oil guarantees powerful, 100% natural results with no harmful side effects
• Reduces hair thinning: rich in folic acid and vitamins a, k and c, this grow hair oil specifically works to thicken the appearance of thin hair to create a fuller, healthier effect with unmistakable shine
• Rejuvenates hair follicles: in addition to preventing thinning and baldness, this is one of the most effective oil hair products when rejuvenating existing hair follicles to provide swift regrowth
• Repairs damaged roots: containing both Amla and coconut oil, this natural hair oil also works to repair any damage that may be present at the root of the hair, ensuring thick regrowth without the risk of breakage or thinning in the future
name: Dabur Methi Amla Hair Oil 200 ml

longDesc:
Origin: India 
Manufacturer: Reckitt Benckiser 

Veet Hair Removal Cream Normal Skin: Hair removal cream with lotus milk and jasmine fragrance. It effectively removes even short stubborn hair and leaves skin moisturized. It can be used on legs, arms, bikini line and underarms for a perfectly finished hair-less skin. It comes with a spatula. So, it is very easy to apply and remove. Veet has a floral fragrance, which makes depilation more pleasant. It’s gentle on your skin, leaving it well-hydrated and subtly fragranced to ensure that there is no lingering malodor. 
Veet Men Hair Removal Cream: This hair removal cream for men starts working in just 5 minutes and leaves behind a soft and stubble-free skin. What’s more, you no longer have to deal with nicks and cuts or razor burns. Veet Men’s hair removal cream is dermatologically tested and a safe option when it comes to hair removal for men. The Hair removal cream can be used on legs, arms as well as the underarm region. With ginseng extract. Leaves skin hydrated up to 24 hours.

Say goodbye to your hair problems. Switch to Vatika!
The New Vatika Enriched Coconut Hair Oil enriched with 7 ayurvedic herbs like Amla, Brahmi, Henna, Kapur, Lemon, Bahera & Harar along with goodness of coconut. Processed by Tel Pak Vidhi, which helps in rejuvenating scalp health & strengthens hair from root to tip and only Vatika coconut Hair Oil is clinically proven to reduce hair fall up to 50% in 4 weeks.

Why Dabur Vatika Enriched Coconut Hair Oil?
• Convenient hair pack with 7 most important ayurvedic herbs.    
• Helps in deep conditioning your scalp.
• Restores natural nutrients to the root tips.
• Problem free healthy hair. 
Directions:
Massage the New Vatika Enriched Coconut Hair Oil onto your scalp thoroughly. Allow the oil to penetrate through your scalp by leaving it for an hour. Rinse your hair thoroughly and notice a healthy shine instantly

Veet Hair Removal Cream Normal Skin Combo
Origin: India
Manufacturer: Reckitt Benckiser 
Hair removal cream with lotus milk and jasmine fragrance. It effectively removes even short stubborn hair and leaves skin moisturized. It can be used on legs, arms, bikini line and underarms for a perfectly finished hair-less skin. It comes with a spatula. So, it is very easy to apply and remove. Veet has a floral fragrance, which makes depilation more pleasant. It’s gentle on your skin, leaving it well-hydrated and subtly fragranced to ensure that there is no lingering malodor.
Quantity: 2 packs

Manufacturer: The Himalaya drugs Ltd.

Revives damaged hair.Makes hair healthy
Himalaya's Damage Repair Protein Shampoo is specially formulated for dry, frizzy and damaged hair caused by blow-drying and chemicals. Contains beach almond and chickpea
Beach Almond
Beach Almond is rich with tannins which are reported to possess antimicrobial antioxidant properties.
 
Chickpea
Chickpea is a rich source of protein. It is an effective hair conditioner which provides daily nourishmen to hair, keeping it soft, smooth and healthy.

Origin: India
Manufacturer: The Himalaya drugs Ltd.

The only side-effect is hair growth
Himalaya's Anti Hair Loss Cream promotes hair growth and controls hair fall by stimulating the active phase of the hair growth cycle. Contains Butea Gum Tree and Climbing Butea.
Butea Gum Tree:
It also known as the 'flame of the forest', is indigenous to India. The herb has astringent properties and is especially useful in scalp treatments.
 
Climbing Butea:
It strengthens hair from the root, which in turn increases the hair's tensile strength.

longDesc:
Love styling your hair but scared of the damage it will cause them? Use Dabur Almond Hair oil and bid adieu to all your hair problems. Enriched with the goodness of Almond protein and Vitamin E, regular use of Dabur Almond Hair Oil help prevent split-ends and hair loss, promote hair growth and restore the natural moisture of the scalp; thus giving you longer, thicker & lustrous hair. So perm your hair or color them but don’t forget to nourish them with a healthy dose of Dabur Almond Hair Oil.

Why Dabur Almond Hair Oil?
• Prevents hair loss & damage
• Nourishes the scalp
• Rich in Vitamin E
• Softens your hair & make them glow
Directions:
• Apply all over the head
• Gently massage the oil onto the scalp using your fingertips
• Leave it for an hour
• Rinse-off with Shampoo for best results
name: Dabur Almond Hair Oil 100 ml
